PW

Tod, the problem is that HeapStatus.doDispose() is disposing Color usedMemCol,
but this Color was acquired via Display.getSystemColor(), so it's a shared Color
which should never be disposed.

I was looking into this because the following simple steps make this error
happen infinitely in the latest 3.2M2 motif build:

- invoke eclipse menu item Window->New Window
- close this newly-created window

I'd consider this to be a major problem since it easily manifests itself for
eclipse users.  Luckily it also has a simple fix.
Michael I think we should fix this for 3.1 M2.
